name: Luumi Platinum Silicone Bag
description: Plastic containers may be convenient, but they're not great for our planet and its ocean life. This platinum silicone bag is flexible, durable and non-toxic, making it a better home for your sandwich and the world we live in.Food-grade silicone is easy to clean, won't transfer taste and is BPA-, BPS-, PVC- and phthalate-free.Airtight button over seal keeps food fresh.Dishwasher, microwave, oven and freezer safe.Dimensions are 15.5 x 16.8 x 4cm.
